469:1: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāpratibhānaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viṃśatibodhisattvaśatasahasraparivāro bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamimāṃ vācamabhāṣetām-alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatvasminnarthe|
469:2: vayamimaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sattvānāṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ|
469:3: kiṃcāpi bhagavan śaṭhakāḥ sattvāstasmin kāle bhaviṣyanti,
469:4: parīttakuśalamūlā adhimānikā lābhasatkārasaṃniśritā akuśalamūlapratipannā durdamā adhimuktivirahitā anadhimuktibahulāḥ,
469:5: api tu khalu punarvayaṃ bhagavan kṣāntibalamupadarśayitvā tasmin kāle idaṃ sūtramuddekṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmo deśayiṣyāmo likhiṣyāmaḥ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ|
469:6: kāyajīvitaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan utsṛjya idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ|
469:8: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavanta metadūcuḥ-vayamapi bhagavan utsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum,
469:9: api tu khalu punarbhagavan anyāsu lokadhātuṣviti|
469:10: atha khalu yāvantaste bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
469:12: sarvāṇi tāni yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadūcuḥ-alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu|
469:13: vayamapīmaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu|
469:15: asyāṃ bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhimānikāḥ sattvā alpakuśalamūlā nityaṃ vyāpannacittāḥ śaṭhā vaṅkajātīyāḥ||
469:16: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato mātṛbhaginī ṣaḍbhirbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhirbhikṣuṇībhiḥ utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamullokayantī sthitābhūt|
469:17: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantrayāmāsa-kiṃ tvaṃ gautami durmanasvinī sthitā tathāgataṃ vyavalokayasi?
469:18: nāhaṃ parikīrtitā vyākṛtā ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
469:19: api tu khalu punargautami sarvaparṣadvayākaraṇena vyākṛtāsi|
469:20: api tu khalu punastvaṃ gautami ita upādāya aṣṭātriṃśatāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi|
469:21: imānyapi ṣaḍ bhikṣuṇīsahasrāṇi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tvayaiva sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike bodhisattvā dharmabhāṇakā bhaviṣyanti|
469:22: tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
469:23: sa ca gautami sarvasattvapriyadarśanastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastāni ṣaḍ bodhisattvasahasrāṇi paraṃparāvyākaraṇena vyākariṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau||
469:24: atha khalu rāhulamāturyaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyā etadabhavat-na me bhagavatā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitam|
469:25: atha khalu bhagavān yaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyāścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya yaśodharāṃ bhikṣuṇīmetadavocat-ārocayāmi te yaśodhare,
469:27: tvamapi daśānāṃ buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi|
469:28: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca anupūrveṇa paripūrya raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidhācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugatolokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān bhadrāyāṃ lokadhātau|
469:29: aparimitaṃ ca tasya bhagavato raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati||
469:30: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇī ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā yaśodharā ca bhikṣuṇī caturbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā bhagavato'ntikāt svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣanta—
469:35: atha khalu tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ-vayamapi bhagavan samutsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye,
469:37: atha khalu bhagavān yena tānyaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhāraṇīpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartikadharmacakrapravartakānāṃ tenāvalokayāmāsa|
469:38: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samanantarāvalokitā bhagavatā utthāyāsanebhyo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmyaivaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ-asmākaṃ bhagavān adhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanatāyai|
469:39: te khalvevamanuvicintya saṃprakampitāḥ parasparamūcuḥ-kathaṃ vayaṃ kulaputrāḥ kariṣyāmo yad bhagavānadhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasyānāgate'dhvani saṃprakāśanatāyai?
469:40: atha khalu te kulaputrā bhagavato gauraveṇa ātmanaśca purvacaryāpraṇidhānena bhagavato'bhimukhaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadante sma-vayaṃ bhagavan anāgate'dhvani imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte daśasu dikṣu gatvā sarvasattvāllekhayiṣyāmaḥ pāṭhayiṣyāmaścintāpayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāmo bhagavata evānubhāvena|
469:42: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samasaṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta—
469:50: aprāpte prāptasaṃjñī ca ghore kālasmi paścime||4||
469:53: raseṣu gṛddha saktāśca gṛhīṇāṃ dharma deśayī|
469:58: tīrthikā batime bhikṣū svāni kāvyāni deśayuḥ||8||
469:62: viprāṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ cāpi bhikṣuṇām||10||
469:65: ye cāsmān kutsayiṣyanti tasmin kālasmi durmatī|
469:71: anarthikāḥ sma kāyena jīvitena ca nāyaka|
469:75: bhṛkuṭī sarva soḍhavyā aprajñaptiḥ punaḥ punaḥ|
469:80: gatvā gatvāsya dāsyāmo nikṣepaṃ tava nāyaka||19||
469:82: alpotsuko bhava tvaṃ hi śāntiprāpto sunirvṛtaḥ||20||
469:83: sarve ca lokapradyotā āgatā ye diśo daśa|
